OOC: Oh ya, I forgot, sorry, I'm just really tired right now, it's 1:30 AM =
here.  

IC:  Symphony pulled out his machine gun with trembling hands.  He=
 wouldn't take the approach he did with the Terrorcons, that would get him =
decapitated again.  He aimed at a Maximal, but then hesitated.  He wanted t=
o be a Decepticon, but had a hard time giving up his Maximal friends.  So h=
e decided to shoot Alliance members.  Symphony fired 23 shots from his mach=
ine gun at Galaxor.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: robertdahl 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2001 1:30 AM
  Subject=
: Re: Slaughter and the Dark Avian


  OOC: Well lets just say Wildrider an=
d Symphony are at the battle (way
  ahead of you man) because I already got=
 there, transformed, smacked you,
  then fired on Lavatron.

  BIC:
  Wildr=
ider frowns at the little effect of his gun. He turns around. "Hey,
  kid, =
what you got?" he says reffering to Symphony.
